trans-unit.source: "Netflix is pleased to announce the open-source release of our crisis management orchestration framework: Dispatch! [built with FastAPI]"
trans-unit.target: “ Netflix很高兴宣布我们的危机管理流程框架的开源版本：Dispatch！（使用FastAPI构建） ”

trans-unit.source: "Honestly, what you've built looks super solid and polished. In many ways, it's what I wanted Hug to be - it's really inspiring to see someone build that."
trans-unit.target: “老实说，您所建造的东西看起来超级坚固，光亮。从很多方面来说，这就是我想要的拥抱-看到有人建造它真的很鼓舞。 ”

trans-unit.source: "I’m over the moon excited about FastAPI. It’s so fun!"
"If you're looking to learn one modern framework for building REST APIs, check out FastAPI [...] It's fast, easy to use and easy to learn [...]"
trans-unit.target: “如果你正在寻找学习一个现代的框架构建的REST API，检查出FastAPI [...]它快速，易于使用和易于学习[...] ”

trans-unit.source: "We adopted the FastAPI library to spawn a REST server that can be queried to obtain predictions. [for Ludwig]"
trans-unit.target: “我们采用FastAPI库生成了一个REST服务器，可以查询该服务器以获得预测。（对于Ludwig） ”

trans-unit.source: "We've switched over to FastAPI for our APIs [...] I think you'll like it [...]"
trans-unit.target: “我们已经为我们的API切换到了FastAPI [...]我想您会喜欢[...] “

trans-unit.source: "[...] I'm using FastAPI a ton these days. [...] I'm actually planning to use it for all of my team's ML services at Microsoft. Some of them are getting integrated into the core Windows product and some Office products."
trans-unit.target: “ [...]这些天，我大量使用FastAPI。[...]我实际上计划将其用于Microsoft团队的所有ML服务。其中一些已集成到Windows核心产品中和一些Office产品。 ”

trans-unit.source: ...from:
requests - Required if you want to use the TestClient.
jinja2 - Required if you want to use the default template configuration.
trans-unit.target: jinja2 -如果要使用默认模板配置，则为必需。

trans-unit.source: uvicorn - for the server that loads and serves your application.
trans-unit.target: uvicorn -用于加载和服务您的应用程序的服务器。

trans-unit.source: python-multipart - Required if you want to support form
email_validator - for email validation.
aiofiles - Required if you want to use FileResponse or StaticFiles.
trans-unit.target: aiofiles -如果要使用 FileResponse 或 StaticFiles ,则为必需。

trans-unit.source: ujson - Required if you want to use UJSONResponse.
ujson - for faster JSON
orjson - Required if you want to use ORJSONResponse.
graphene - Required for GraphQLApp support.
Pydantic for the data parts.
itsdangerous - Required for SessionMiddleware support.
pyyaml - Required for Starlette's SchemaGenerator support (you probably don't need it with FastAPI).
trans-unit.target: pyyaml -Starlette的 SchemaGenerator 支持所必需的（FastAPI可能不需要它）。

trans-unit.source: Starlette for the web parts.
--reload: make the server restart after code changes. Only do this for development.
trans-unit.target: --reload ：更改代码后使服务器重新启动。仅这样做是为了发展。

trans-unit.source: UUID objects.
app: the object created inside of main.py with the line app = FastAPI().
trans-unit.target: app ：在 main.py 内部创建的对象，其中包含 app = FastAPI() 。

trans-unit.source: datetime objects.
main: the file main.py (the Python "module").
FastAPI framework, high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready for production
trans-unit.target: FastAPI框架，高性能，易于学习，快速编码，可投入生产

trans-unit.source: CORS
Cookie Sessions
Documentation: https://fastapi.tiangolo.com
Easy: Designed to be easy to use and learn. Less time reading docs.
trans-unit.target: 简易：旨在易于使用和学习。减少阅读文档的时间。

trans-unit.source: Fast to code: Increase the speed to develop features by about 200% to 300%. *
trans-unit.target: 快速编写代码：将功能开发的速度提高大约200％至300％。*

trans-unit.source: Fast: Very high performance, on par with NodeJS and Go (thanks to Starlette and Pydantic). One of the fastest Python frameworks available.
trans-unit.target: 快速：非常高的性能，看齐的NodeJS和围棋（感谢Starlette和Pydantic）。最快的Python框架之一。

trans-unit.source: Fewer bugs: Reduce about 40% of human (developer) induced errors. *
trans-unit.target: 更少的错误：减少约40％的人为错误（开发人员）。*

trans-unit.source: GraphQL
Intuitive: Great editor support.
Note:
Robust: Get production-ready code. With automatic interactive documentation.
trans-unit.target: 健壮：获取可用于生产的代码。具有自动交互式文档。

trans-unit.source: Short: Minimize code duplication. Multiple features from each parameter declaration. Fewer bugs.
trans-unit.target: 短：最小化代码重复。每个参数声明中的多个功能。更少的错误。

trans-unit.source: Source Code: https://github.com/tiangolo/fastapi

trans-unit.target: 剧透警报：教程-用户指南包括：

trans-unit.source: Standards-based: Based on (and fully compatible with) the open standards for APIs: OpenAPI (previously known as Swagger) and JSON Schema.
trans-unit.target: 基于标准：基于（并完全兼容）API的开放标准：OpenAPI（以前称为Swagger）和JSON Schema。

trans-unit.target: 一个非常强大且易于使用的依赖注入系统。

trans-unit.target: 当数据无效时,自动并清除错误。

trans-unit.target: 检查 GET 请求是否有一个名为 q 的可选查询参数（如 http://127.0.0.1:8000/items/foo?q=somequery ）。

trans-unit.source: Check it
Check that it has a required attribute name that should be a str.
trans-unit.target: 检查它是否具有必需的属性 name ，该名称应为 str 。

trans-unit.source: Check that it has a required attribute price that has to be a float.
trans-unit.target: 检查其是否具有必需的属性 price ，该价格必须是 float 价格。

trans-unit.source: Check that it has an optional attribute is_offer, that should be a bool, if present.
trans-unit.target: 检查它是否具有可选属性 is_offer ，如果存在的话应该为 bool 。

trans-unit.source: FastAPI is a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.6+ based on standard Python type hints.
trans-unit.target: FastAPI是一个现代的、快速的(高性能的)、基于标准Python类型提示的用Python 3.6+构建API的web框架。

trans-unit.source: Independent TechEmpower benchmarks show FastAPI applications running under Uvicorn as one of the fastest Python frameworks available, only below Starlette and Uvicorn themselves (used internally by FastAPI). (*)
trans-unit.target: 独立的TechEmpower基准测试显示，在Uvicorn下运行的FastAPI应用程序是可用的最快的Python框架之一，仅在Starlette和Uvicorn本身（由FastAPI内部使用）之下。（*）

You can install all of these with pip install fastapi[all].
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 pip install fastapi[all] 安装所有这些工具。

trans-unit.source: You do that with standard modern Python types.
trans-unit.target: 你可以用标准的现代 Python 类型来做。

trans-unit.source: You don't have to learn a new syntax, the methods or classes of a specific library, etc.
trans-unit.target: 你不需要学习新的语法、特定库的方法或类等。

trans-unit.source: You will also need an ASGI server, for production such as Uvicorn or Hypercorn.
trans-unit.target: 您还需要一个ASGI服务器，用于生产如Uvicorn或Hypercorn。
